overview: I am a writer from Indiana, USA. I write whenever the ideas are coming, and keep the home beautiful when I am not writing. I spend as much time as 8 hours a day on my pc. I have re-built my computer and a few years ago would have not figured it out. The more I work with the pc the more I seem to figure out. I reinstalled Windows and re-partitioned too. I am a music lover of Jackson Browne, Keith Urban and lots of others. I am on Google+ and Facebook and enjoy writing to people if they write back. I enjoy like, we enjoy the out of doors, and historic places in Indiana and Illinois. I welcome anyone who would like to write me about music and wriitng.
